Interface ModelListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GobbleModelClone, GobbleUI, ViewProxy

    public interface ModelListener
    The listener interface for receiving model events. The class that is interested in processing a model event implements this interface, and the object created with that class is registered with a component using the component's addModelListener method. When the model event occurs, that object's appropriate method is invoked.
    See Also:
    ModelEvent
